PerspectiveCamera Class

Defined in: src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:77
Module: facets
Parent Module: EIGHT

The PerspectiveCamera provides projection matrix and view matrix uniforms to the current Material.

The PerspectiveCamera plays the role of a host in the Visitor pattern. The FacetVistor will normally be a Material implementation. The accepting method is called setUniforms.

Constructor

PerspectiveCamera

(
  • [fov = 45 * Math.PI / 180]
  • [aspect=1]
  • [near=0.1]
  • [far=1000]
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:77

Parameters:

  • [fov = 45 * Math.PI / 180] Number optional

    The field of view.

  • [aspect=1] Number optional

    The aspect is the ratio width / height.

  • [near=0.1] Number optional

    The distance of the near plane from the camera.

  • [far=1000] Number optional

    The distance of the far plane from the camera.

Example:

const ambients: Facet[] = []

const camera = new EIGHT.PerspectiveCamera()
camera.aspect = canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight
camera.eye = Geometric3.copyVector(R3.e3)
ambients.push(camera)

scene.draw(ambients)

The camera is initially positioned at e3

  • Methods

PerspectiveCamera:

Properties

aspect

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:156

The aspect ratio (width / height) of the camera viewport.

eye

Geometric3

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:181

The position of the camera, a vector.

far

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:277

fov

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:205

The field of view is the (planar) angle (magnitude) in the camera horizontal plane that encloses object that can be seen. Measured in radians.

inner

Perspective private

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:70

Geometric3

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:231

Number

The distance to the near plane.
